code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_BASE="https://intern-portal-backend-wuk4.onrender.com";const Leaderboard=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get(`${API_BASE}/leaderboard`).then(res=>setData(res.data));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card p-4 shadow-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"mb-3",children:"Leaderboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table table-striped table-hover",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{className:"table-dark",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"#"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Donations"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:data.map((intern,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:index+1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:intern.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:["\u20B9",intern.donations]})]},index))})]})]});};export default Leaderboard;
